content: After at least 40 years of troubles with weapons in Gaza, a consortium of 'concerned states' is set to put the kibosh on arms imports. What this means remains to be seen as one on the concerned states is directly responsible for, perhaps, the largest single importation of arms into Gaza. That is, of course, the shipment of US weapons 'stolen' from Fatah when it was sent into Gaza just over a year ago. As if there have been shipments of weapons marked 'Gaza' going anywhere near the place since the blockade started, and even well before that. Guess Egypt's missing cause it ain't in Europe, huh?

title: Better Late Than Never

content: yeah, right...... remains to be seen. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
